title: Quarkus openshift extension fails to deploy application on OCP 4.14

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

I have an app, which is deployed to openshift 4.14 by `quarkus-openshift` extension. It can be deployed when I use Quarkus 3.5.0, but there is an exception, when I use 999-SNAPSHOT

### Expected behavior

The app should be deployed succesfully

### Actual behavior

an exception:
```

```

### How to Reproduce?

1.  `git clone git@github.com:quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite.git tests`
2. `cd tests/super-size/many-extensions`
3. Run the script:
```
mvn clean package -Dnative.encoding=UTF-8 -Pdeploy-to-openshift-using-extension -Dquarkus.kubernetes.deploy=true -Dquarkus.openshift.route.expose=true -Dquarkus.application.name=app -Dquarkus.kubernetes-client.trust-certs=true -Dquarkus.kubernetes.deployment-target=openshift -Dquarkus.s2i.base-jvm-image=registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:latest -Dquarkus.openshift.base-jvm-image=registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:latest -Dquarkus.platform.version=999-SNAPSHOT
```

This works:
```
mvn clean package -Dnative.encoding=UTF-8 -Pdeploy-to-openshift-using-extension -Dquarkus.kubernetes.deploy=true -Dquarkus.openshift.route.expose=true -Dquarkus.application.name=app -Dquarkus.kubernetes-client.trust-certs=true -Dquarkus.kubernetes.deployment-target=openshift -Dquarkus.s2i.base-jvm-image=registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:latest -Dquarkus.openshift.base-jvm-image=registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:latest -Dquarkus.platform.version=3.5.0
```


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

6.5.12-300.fc39.x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

17.0.8, vendor: Eclipse Adoptium

### Quarkus version or git rev

2cb598b2d3ff838e66558b6b56653370aa7816bb

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.7 (b89d5959fcde851dcb1c8946a785a163f14e1e29)

### Additional information

```
$ oc version
Client Version: 4.13.0-202308290326.p0.g17b7acc.assembly.stream-17b7acc
Kustomize Version: v4.5.7
Kubernetes Version: v1.27.6+f67aeb3
```
